column1: {'quote': "So much of life is not about whether you're good or bad, or right or wrong, or can afford or not afford - it's just about timing.", 'author': 'A. A. Gill', 'country': 'British', 'profession': 'Writer', 'born': 'June 28', 'died': 'December 10', 'categories': ['Life', 'Good', 'Bad']}

{'quote': 'Because there is no better tool for writing than experience. It has very little to do with grammar and everything to do with knowing.', 'author': 'A. A. Gill', 'country': 'British', 'profession': 'Writer', 'born': 'June 28', 'died': 'December 10', 'categories': ['Experience', 'Better', 'Everything']}

{'quote': 'Shorts are silly. Men in shorts are silly men. And silly is the very worst thing a man can be.', 'author': 'A. A. Gill', 'country': 'British', 'profession': 'Writer', 'born': 'June 28', 'died': 'December 10', 'categories': ['Men', 'Man', 'Worst']}

{'quote': "I'm terribly prone to anxiety. I get very depressed and I get very anxious and my anxiety is almost always about my children.", 'author': 'A. A. Gill', 'country': 'British', 'profession': 'Writer', 'born': 'June 28', 'died': 'December 10', 'categories': ['Children', 'Always', 'Anxiety']}

{'quote': "It's not in the nature of stoic Cincinnatians to boast, which is fortunate, really, for they have meager pickings to boast about.", 'author': 'A. A. Gill', 'country': 'British', 'profession': 'Writer', 'born': 'June 28', 'died': 'December 10', 'categories': ['Nature', 'Fortunate', 'About']}

{'quote': 'In fact, everybody should wake up smelling nice. I go further, there is not an excuse, ever, not to smell nice, particularly your feet.', 'author': 'A. A. Gill', 'country': 'British', 'profession': 'Writer', 'born': 'June 28', 'died': 'December 10', 'categories': ['Feet', 'Wake Up', 'Smell']}

{'quote': "Texting isn't writing. It's not like letter writing. Texting is short scriptwriting. It's a collaborative soap opera where nothing happens.", 'author': 'A. A. Gill', 'country': 'British', 'profession': 'Writer', 'born': 'June 28', 'died': 'December 10', 'categories': ['Nothing', 'Opera', 'Happens']}

{'quote': "You don't have a choice about fashion or aesthetics - you're in it, whether you like it or not.", 'author': 'A. A. Gill', 'country': 'British', 'profession': 'Writer', 'born': 'June 28', 'died': 'December 10', 'categories': ['Choice', 'Fashion', 'Like']}

{'quote': 'To a British politician, a police officer is as invisible as the railings.', 'author': 'A. A. Gill', 'country': 'British', 'profession': 'Writer', 'born': 'June 28', 'died': 'December 10', 'categories': ['Police', 'Politician', 'Invisible']}

{'quote': "Songs are all poetry, and they don't make any sense.", 'author': 'A. A. Gill', 'country': 'British', 'profession': 'Writer', 'born': 'June 28', 'died': 'December 10', 'categories': ['Poetry', 'Sense', 'Make']}

{'quote': "Clothes maketh the man. They don't make you some other man.", 'author': 'A. A. Gill', 'country': 'British', 'profession': 'Writer', 'born': 'June 28', 'died': 'December 10', 'categories': ['Man', 'Clothes', 'Make']}

{'quote': "Writing, for me, is the great organiser. It's while writing that I think most deeply about things.", 'author': 'A. A. Gill', 'country': 'British', 'profession': 'Writer', 'born': 'June 28', 'died': 'December 10', 'categories': ['Great', 'Me', 'Writing']}

{'quote': "A lot of London's image never was. There never was a Dickensian London, or a Shakespearean London, or a swinging London.", 'author': 'A. A. Gill', 'country': 'British', 'profession': 'Writer', 'born': 'June 28', 'died': 'December 10', 'categories': ['Never', 'Image', 'Swinging']}

{'quote': "The problem with a man bag is that it's called a man bag.", 'author': 'A. A. Gill', 'country': 'British', 'profession': 'Writer', 'born': 'June 28', 'died': 'December 10', 'categories': ['Man', 'Bag', 'Problem']}

{'quote': "People who don't believe in God are no happier than people who do, and those who do believe are no nicer than those who don't.", 'author': 'A. A. Gill', 'country': 'British', 'profession': 'Writer', 'born': 'June 28', 'died': 'December 10', 'categories': ['God', 'Believe', 'People']}

{'quote': "I don't do dinner parties. I have people come to share the food I've cooked for the family.", 'author': 'A. A. Gill', 'country': 'British', 'profession': 'Writer', 'born': 'June 28', 'died': 'December 10', 'categories': ['Family', 'Food', 'Dinner']}

{'quote': 'Personal adornment is the only cultural form that everybody in the world takes part in.', 'author': 'A. A. Gill', 'country': 'British', 'profession': 'Writer', 'born': 'June 28', 'died': 'December 10', 'categories': ['World', 'Personal', 'Only']}

{'quote': 'The French are never happy coming to London; this is an ancient and comforting enmity.', 'author': 'A. A. Gill', 'country': 'British', 'profession': 'Writer', 'born': 'June 28', 'died': 'December 10', 'categories': ['Happy', 'Never', 'Coming']}

{'quote': "Bald isn't like being ethnic or disabled. Everyone can and will make jokes about it and expect you to laugh good-naturedly, which you will.", 'author': 'A. A. Gill', 'country': 'British', 'profession': 'Writer', 'born': 'June 28', 'died': 'December 10', 'categories': ['Laugh', 'Bald', 'Will']}

{'quote': "I've often been accused of dressing too well. I've always been fascinated by fashion, though I don't think I'm particularly fashionable.", 'author': 'A. A. Gill', 'country': 'British', 'profession': 'Writer', 'born': 'June 28', 'died': 'December 10', 'categories': ['Fashion', 'Always', 'Think']}

{'quote': "The measure of a man's life is how he copes with the terrible wall of fear.", 'author': 'A. A. Gill', 'country': 'British', 'profession': 'Writer', 'born': 'June 28', 'died': 'December 10', 'categories': ['Life', 'Fear', 'Man']}

{'quote': 'Twenty is a tough age because it slips past in the middle of so much else - university, gap year, leaving home, getting jobs.', 'author': 'A. A. Gill', 'country': 'British', 'profession': 'Writer', 'born': 'June 28', 'died': 'December 10', 'categories': ['Age', 'Home', 'Past']}
{'quote': '\n\n', 'author': 'A. A. Gill', 'country': 'British', 'profession': 'Writer', 'born': 'June 28', 'died': 'December 10', 'categories': ['Time', 'Black', 'Dark']}

{'quote': 'The part that makes you unique is the bit people will like or fear, fall in love with, or try to avoid.', 'author': 'A. A. Gill', 'country': 'British', 'profession': 'Writer', 'born': 'June 28', 'died': 'December 10', 'categories': ['Love', 'Fear', 'Unique']}

{'quote': 'Gift giving is one of the oldest forms of human interaction. It is a behaviour all cultures and all classes share.', 'author': 'A. A. Gill', 'country': 'British', 'profession': 'Writer', 'born': 'June 28', 'died': 'December 10', 'categories': ['Gift', 'Human', 'Interaction']}

{'quote': "Boredom is not a thing. It's not a feeling or a condition. It is the absence of feelings, things and conditions.", 'author': 'A. A. Gill', 'country': 'British', 'profession': 'Writer', 'born': 'June 28', 'died': 'December 10', 'categories': ['Feelings', 'Boredom', 'Feeling']}

{'quote': "I don't remember ever stealing things, but I suppose I was endlessly borrowing money off people.", 'author': 'A. A. Gill', 'country': 'British', 'profession': 'Writer', 'born': 'June 28', 'died': 'December 10', 'categories': ['Money', 'Remember', 'People']}

{'quote': "So much of life is not about whether you're good or bad, or right or wrong, or can afford or not afford - it's just about timing.", 'author': 'A. A. Gill', 'country': 'British', 'profession': 'Writer', 'born': 'June 28', 'died': 'December 10', 'categories': ['Life', 'Good', 'Bad']}

{'quote': "I don't remember ever stealing things, but I suppose I was endlessly borrowing money off people.", 'author': 'A. A. Gill', 'country': 'British', 'profession': 'Writer', 'born': 'June 28', 'died': 'December 10', 'categories': ['Money', 'Remember', 'People']}

{'quote': "No one wants to hear the truth if it isn't what they want to hear.", 'author': 'Aaron Brown', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Truth', 'Want', 'Hear']}

{'quote': 'TV news is what you want it to be, and if you want it to be different, take a look at what you watch.', 'author': 'Aaron Brown', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Look', 'News', 'Be Different']}

{'quote': 'Television is the most perfect democracy. You sit there with your remote control and vote.', 'author': 'Aaron Brown', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Democracy', 'Perfect', 'Control']}

{'quote': "I have no problem with the security... It's something that must be done for the times in which we live. Safety first.", 'author': 'Aaron Brown', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Done', 'Security', 'Live']}

{'quote': "We are in the business of gathering the news. We're not in the business of talking about the news.", 'author': 'Aaron Brown', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Business', 'News', 'Gathering']}

{'quote': 'I know the difference between journalism and a slogan.', 'author': 'Aaron Brown', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Journalism', 'Know', 'Difference']}

{'quote': "There's always room for improvement. That's my mindset.", 'author': 'Aaron Donald', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Improvement', 'Room', 'Always']}

{'quote': "I know you ain't gonna win every single one-on-one, but in my mind, I'm supposed to.", 'author': 'Aaron Donald', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Mind', 'Win', 'Know']}
{'quote': "It's a lot more fun when you're winning than losing.", 'author': 'Aaron Donald', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Winning', 'Fun', 'Losing']}

{'quote': "I don't see myself as somebody special. I just see myself as Aaron, the same guy I've been all my life.", 'author': 'Aaron Donald', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Life', 'Myself', 'My Life']}

{'quote': "Big-time players make big-time plays in big-time spots. That's who I want to be.", 'author': 'Aaron Donald', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Players', 'Want', 'Who']}

{'quote': 'I never let nothing ever get to me. Everyone is entitled to their own opinion.', 'author': 'Aaron Donald', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Me', 'Nothing', 'Opinion']}
{'quote': 'God just blessed me with quickness and speed, I guess.', 'author': 'Aaron Donald', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['God', 'Me', 'Blessed']}

{'quote': "It's a headache, chasing a guy around. I'd rather play against a quarterback that sits still.", 'author': 'Aaron Donald', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Headache', 'Play', 'Against']}

{'quote': "Any time you're rewarded and can be a part of history, it's a special moment.", 'author': 'Aaron Donald', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['History', 'Time', 'Moment']}

{'quote': "When my name is called I'm going to go in there and give it everything I've got.", 'author': 'Aaron Donald', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Name', 'Go', 'Everything']}

{'quote': 'I want to be great, I want to be mentioned with the best to ever play the game.', 'author': 'Aaron Donald', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Best', 'Great', 'Game']}

{'quote': "You never know what's going to happen in the draft. You just wait until your name gets called and then things happen.", 'author': 'Aaron Donald', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Wait', 'Know', 'Never']}

{'quote': "You visualize making a game-changing play, that's what you're here for.", 'author': 'Aaron Donald', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Play', 'Here', 'Visualize']}

{'quote': "Pitt will always be my school and I'm honored to be able to support the Blue and Gold.", 'author': 'Aaron Donald', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Gold', 'Support', 'Blue']}

{'quote': "Any time you get a Hall of Fame player that even knows my name, you're going to be pumped up about that.", 'author': 'Aaron Donald', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Time', 'Name', 'Fame']}

{'quote': "When I'm retired someday, when I'm done playing football, that's when I'll be relaxing and look back at some things.", 'author': 'Aaron Donald', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Football', 'Look', 'Done']}

{'quote': "I have experience at every position... I think that's a plus for me.", 'author': 'Aaron Donald', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Experience', 'Me', 'Position']}
{'quote': "I'm just a football player.", 'author': 'Aaron Donald', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Football', 'Just', 'Football Player']}
{'quote': "I'm just a guy. There's nothing special about me.", 'author': 'Aaron Donald', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Me', 'Nothing', 'Special']}
{'quote': "It's an offensive league.", 'author': 'Aaron Donald', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['League', 'Offensive']}

{'quote': "The big-time player makes big-time plays in big-time games and that's what we need to keep doing.", 'author': 'Aaron Donald', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Doing', 'Need', 'Keep']}

{'quote': "I'm just playing my game and trying to help my team win. Whatever happens, happens.", 'author': 'Aaron Donald', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Game', 'Win', 'Help']}
{'quote': "It doesn't ever hurt to try different stuff.", 'author': 'Aaron Donald', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Hurt', 'Try', 'Different']}
{'quote': "As long as somebody is making sacks, I'm happy.", 'author': 'Aaron Donald', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Long', 'Happy', 'Somebody']}

{'quote': 'A lot of my success, and a lot of who I am now, is because of my dad, and the way he raised me and taught me how to have a work ethic.', 'author': 'Aaron Donald', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Success', 'Work', 'Dad']}

{'quote': 'I always tell my dad he was training me to be a pro before he even knew it.', 'author': 'Aaron Donald', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Dad', 'Me', 'Training']}

{'quote': 'You always want to have success, but you never think it will be as big as it is.', 'author': 'Aaron Donald', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Success', 'Will', 'Never']}
{'quote': 'You never know what can happen.', 'author': 'Aaron Donald', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Know', 'Never', 'Happen']}
{'quote': 'I was a big Steelers fan.', 'author': 'Aaron Donald', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Big', 'Fan']}
{'quote': 'I love football, but being away from it is tough.', 'author': 'Aaron Donald', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Love', 'Football', 'Tough']}
{'quote': 'My main goal is trying to win the Super Bowl.', 'author': 'Aaron Donald', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Win', 'Trying', 'Bowl']}

{'quote': "I'm just going to go play football - fly around and make some plays. That's all that matters.", 'author': 'Aaron Donald', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Football', 'Fly', 'Go']}

{'quote': "I've got leverage on a guy that's 6-6, and I'm strong enough to push 600-plus pounds off on a double-team.", 'author': 'Aaron Donald', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Enough', 'Push', 'Strong']}

{'quote': 'Once you start worrying about things, you get down about yourself, whatever it may be.', 'author': 'Aaron Donald', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Yourself', 'Start', 'Down']}

{'quote': "I've got a good team, got great agents that I know are going to handle the business side, and I trust those guys.", 'author': 'Aaron Donald', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Trust', 'Business', 'Good']}
{'quote': 'All I can do is play football, put it on film.', 'author': 'Aaron Donald', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Football', 'I Can', 'Film']}

{'quote': "I feel like I've got a lot of football things I need to work on to have that success that I want to have in this league.", 'author': 'Aaron Donald', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Success', 'Work', 'Football']}

{'quote': "You can never be satisfied until you are done playing this game. So I'm just working.", 'author': 'Aaron Donald', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Game', 'Done', 'Never']}
{'quote': 'Any time you go on the field, you want to dominate as a unit.', 'author': 'Aaron Donald', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Time', 'Go', 'Want']}
{'quote': 'After games, you think about the play you missed.', 'author': 'Aaron Donald', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Play', 'Think', 'About']}
{'quote': 'When I have one-on-ones, I usually win those.', 'author': 'Aaron Donald', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Win', 'Those']}

{'quote': 'I consider myself a blue-collar actor, just chugging away.', 'author': 'Aaron Stanford', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Myself', 'Actor', 'Blue-Collar']}

{'quote': "But a lot of shows, they pose questions and they give you a puzzle where there's no solution.", 'author': 'Aaron Stanford', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Puzzle', 'Questions', 'Pose']}

{'quote': "Of course, I'm not allowed to talk about the script, but I can say it is a really good story.", 'author': 'Aaron Stanford', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Good', 'I Can', 'Talk']}

{'quote': "I've been recognized very seldom. I think I just look different in person than I do as the character.", 'author': 'Aaron Stanford', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Character', 'Look', 'Person']}

{'quote': 'I try to pick characters that I find interesting and complex and that I feel I can bring something of myself to.', 'author': 'Aaron Stanford', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Myself', 'Feel', 'I Can']}

{'quote': 'Wes Craven is obviously a horror film icon so I was definitely very interested in bringing something back to life that Wes had created.', 'author': 'Aaron Stanford', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Life', 'Back', 'Something']}

{'quote': "I didn't follow the whole 'X-Men' story because it got too complicated. I'd pick up a comic book and have no idea what was going on.", 'author': 'Aaron Stanford', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Follow', 'Story', 'Complicated']}

{'quote': "It's nice to know when you're a part of a story, it's nice to know at least something about the beginning, middle, and end.", 'author': 'Aaron Stanford', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Beginning', 'End', 'Know']}
{'quote': "I'm not your traditional action hero.", 'author': 'Aaron Stanford', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Hero', 'Action', 'Your']}

{'quote': 'Almost all of my favorite shows are limited series. It just seems to be the better way to go.', 'author': 'Aaron Stanford', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Way', 'Better', 'Go']}

{'quote': "It's great to be able to work on some science fiction. I love the genre.", 'author': 'Aaron Stanford', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Love', 'Work', 'Science']}

{'quote': "I worshiped Judd Nelson in 'The Breakfast Club' growing up. I must've seen that movie 100 times.", 'author': 'Aaron Stanford', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Breakfast', 'Club', 'Up']}

{'quote': "No one says the word 'quirky' much in England. I guess because people are more naturally eccentric.", 'author': 'Alexa Chung', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['People', 'More', 'Guess']}

{'quote': 'I am but an architectural composer.', 'author': 'Alexander Jackson Davis', 'country': 'American', 'profession': 'Architect', 'born': 'July 24', 'died': 'January 14', 'categories': ['Architecture', 'I Am', 'Architectural']}

{'quote': 'I have designed the most buildings of any living American architect.', 'author': 'Alexander Jackson Davis', 'country': 'American', 'profession': 'Architect', 'born': 'July 24', 'died': 'January 14', 'categories': ['Architecture', 'Living', 'Buildings']}

{'quote': "I mean, you make a movie with Sarah Palin in it, you get great ratings. That's easy. I know how to get ratings: get Sarah Palin.", 'author': 'Alexandra C. Pelosi', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Great', 'Know', 'Easy']}

{'quote': 'Government has to produce affordable housing. Government has to produce answers.', 'author': 'Alexandra C. Pelosi', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Government', 'Housing', 'Affordable Housing']}

{'quote': 'Cable news wants you to believe that America is red versus blue. I would argue America is way more purple than it looks.', 'author': 'Alexandra C. Pelosi', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Believe', 'Blue', 'News']}

{'quote': "Because in this business, as you know, you don't get that many bites at the apple, so I make documentaries for HBO and that's what I do.", 'author': 'Alexandra C. Pelosi', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Business', 'Know', 'Apple']}

{'quote': 'MSNBC is barred from my household. CNN is barred from my household.', 'author': 'Alexandra C. Pelosi', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['CNN', 'Household', 'Barred']}

{'quote': "I just don't know that we're as filled with hate as cable news leads us to believe. It's hard to hate up close.", 'author': 'Alexandra C. Pelosi', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Hate', 'Believe', 'News']}

{'quote': 'I get that Republicans have spent hundreds of millions of dollars to turn my last name into a curse word.', 'author': 'Alexandra C. Pelosi', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Name', 'Curse', 'Turn']}

{'quote': "No one ever won betting against Nancy Pelosi. You've got to give her credit, no matter what you think of her.", 'author': 'Alexandra C. Pelosi', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Credit', 'Matter', 'Think']}

{'quote': "If you spend time with people, you understand where they're coming from and you respect them more than if you're judging from a distance.", 'author': 'Alexandra C. Pelosi', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Respect', 'Time', 'People']}

{'quote': "San Francisco is the microcosm for what's happening all over the world.", 'author': 'Alexandra C. Pelosi', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['World', 'Over', 'Happening']}

{'quote': 'Cities need to reinvent themselves in order to stay alive.', 'author': 'Alexandra C. Pelosi', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Alive', 'Stay', 'Order']}

{'quote': "There's a certain attitude that you'll experience in San Francisco. You could call it hubris.", 'author': 'Alexandra C. Pelosi', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Attitude', 'Experience', 'Hubris']}

{'quote': "There's a lot of documentaries out in the world; it sometimes seems as if there's no topic left!", 'author': 'Alexandra C. Pelosi', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['World', 'Sometimes', 'Left']}

{'quote': 'I come from a deeply Catholic family. My husband and I were married in a Catholic church; we decided to put our kids into Catholic school.', 'author': 'Alexandra C. Pelosi', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Family', 'School', 'Church']}

{'quote': "I'm a happy person! I guess I'm not as much of a pessimist as most documentary filmmakers.", 'author': 'Alexandra C. Pelosi', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Happy', 'Person', 'Pessimist']}

{'quote': 'I may live in liberal America, but I know that this is not the only America.', 'author': 'Alexandra C. Pelosi', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Live', 'Know', 'America']}

{'quote': "I'm not a part of the political industrial complex.", 'author': 'Alexandra C. Pelosi', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Political', 'Complex', 'Industrial']}

{'quote': 'But there was money before Citizens United, and there will be money after.', 'author': 'Alexandra C. Pelosi', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Money', 'Will', 'United']}

{'quote': "It's a good line to say we're going to get money out of politics. I don't know how realistic it is.", 'author': 'Alexandra C. Pelosi', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Politics', 'Money', 'Good']}

{'quote': "I don't have any political agenda. I never have and I never will.", 'author': 'Alexandra C. Pelosi', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Political', 'Will', 'Never']}

{'quote': 'I never say I make documentaries. I say I make television.', 'author': 'Alexandra C. Pelosi', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Never', 'Television', 'Say']}

{'quote': 'There are a lot of lonely people on the planet that have a lot of money in their pocket and no place to go on a Friday night.', 'author': 'Alexandra C. Pelosi', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Money', 'Night', 'People']}

{'quote': "Power isn't real, and it isn't earned. If you act like you have it, suddenly you're leading everyone. Perception is reality.", 'author': 'Alexandra C. Pelosi', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Power', 'Reality', 'Perception']}
{'quote': "Income inequality isn't sexy.", 'author': 'Alexandra C. Pelosi', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Sexy', 'Inequality', 'Income']}

{'quote': "I live in Manhattan, and on my block there's a church with a soup line every day. There are a lot of children there.", 'author': 'Alexandra C. Pelosi', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Day', 'Children', 'Every Day']}

{'quote': "A lot of communities pretend they don't have homeless and just ignore them or try to make them go away.", 'author': 'Alexandra C. Pelosi', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Ignore', 'Go', 'Try']}

{'quote': 'Everyone talks about immigrants taking jobs, but there are a lot of jobs that America needs.', 'author': 'Alexandra C. Pelosi', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['America', 'Everyone', 'Needs']}

{'quote': "As a documentary filmmaker, I couldn't afford to give my children the lifestyle I had in San Francisco growing up.", 'author': 'Alexandra C. Pelosi', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Children', 'Lifestyle', 'Documentary']}

{'quote': "San Francisco is not a boutique - it's a center of commerce.", 'author': 'Alexandra C. Pelosi', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Commerce', 'Center', 'San Francisco']}

{'quote': 'Towns have to evolve. Towns have to grow up. But not at the expense of the real people.', 'author': 'Alexandra C. Pelosi', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Grow', 'People', 'Real']}

{'quote': "I mean, you can forget about George Bush or Jerry Falwell. You can't forget about a homeless kid.", 'author': 'Alexandra C. Pelosi', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Forget', 'Mean', 'Homeless']}

{'quote': "I don't have camera crews. I don't have sound guys. What you see is what you get: just me and my camcorder.", 'author': 'Alexandra C. Pelosi', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Me', 'See', 'Sound']}

{'quote': "I used to be a kid with a camera, and that used to be kind of endearing to people. Now I'm sort of an old lady with a camera.", 'author': 'Alexandra C. Pelosi', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Lady', 'People', 'Be Kind']}

{'quote': "Without fear you can't explore or push yourself beyond what you've done.", 'author': 'Alexandre Desplat', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Fear', 'Yourself', 'Done']}

{'quote': "I've been pretty lucky to work with directors who were quite influenced by European cinema.", 'author': 'Alexandre Desplat', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Work', 'Cinema', 'Pretty']}

{'quote': "There's a quality to the sound of a trumpet that you can really twist for any kind of sound and mood that you want to create.", 'author': 'Alexandre Desplat', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Quality', 'Mood', 'Create']}

{'quote': 'My parents had a lot of movie soundtracks that they brought back from the States. So very early on I heard film music at home.', 'author': 'Alexandre Desplat', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Music', 'Home', 'Parents']}

{'quote': 'Music can make you go from sadness to an immense sadness. There is a limit; if you go too far, it becomes schmaltzy.', 'author': 'Alexandre Desplat', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Music', 'Go', 'Sadness']}

{'quote': "It's not about what's a good or bad score at the Oscars, rather what's exposed to the ears more.", 'author': 'Alexandre Desplat', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Good', 'Bad', 'More']}
{'quote': 'You need to be in danger; otherwise, you get old.', 'author': 'Alexandre Desplat', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Old', 'Danger', 'Need']}
{'quote': 'I just write from dawn to dusk.', 'author': 'Alexandre Desplat', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Dawn', 'Dusk', 'Just']}

{'quote': "The first thing is, you can't write movie music if you don't know how to write quickly.", 'author': 'Alexandre Desplat', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Music', 'Know', 'First']}

{'quote': 'Well I think usually I would do six or even 10 scores a year. Some are big films and some are not.', 'author': 'Alexandre Desplat', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Big', 'Think', 'Well']}

{'quote': 'In my early teens, I started collecting soundtrack albums.', 'author': 'Alexandre Desplat', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Early', 'Collecting', 'Soundtrack']}

{'quote': 'When synthesizers appeared everyone was a composer suddenly.', 'author': 'Alexandre Desplat', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Everyone', 'Suddenly', 'Composer']}

{'quote': "When you compose, it's like writing. You're like a writer. You just think all the time.", 'author': 'Alexandre Desplat', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Time', 'Writing', 'Think']}

{'quote': "We will always hear the vibrations of Ennio's music and feel it in our hearts.", 'author': 'Alexandre Desplat', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Music', 'Feel', 'Will']}

{'quote': "The great directors, I've learned, have a great sense of rhythm.", 'author': 'Alexandre Desplat', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Great', 'Sense', 'Rhythm']}

{'quote': "Godzilla' took two months because it required a two-hour-plus score. 'Imitation Game' was three weeks.", 'author': 'Alexandre Desplat', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Game', 'Three', 'Two']}

{'quote': "The main difference I'd say is that European cinema has always used less music than American cinema for historical reasons.", 'author': 'Alexandre Desplat', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Music', 'Cinema', 'Always']}

{'quote': "I've always been a film lover - that's why I've always wanted to write music for films.", 'author': 'Alexandre Desplat', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Music', 'Why', 'Always']}

{'quote': "I liked 'The Darjeeling Limited' very much. There was a melancholy about that film that I liked.", 'author': 'Alexandre Desplat', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Film', 'Melancholy', 'About']}

{'quote': 'Music has to deal with silence. Music has to deal with time.', 'author': 'Alexandre Desplat', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Music', 'Time', 'Silence']}

{'quote': "That's the main lesson I've learned from working in the theater: respect the dramaturgy. I don't want to overwhelm everything with music.", 'author': 'Alexandre Desplat', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Respect', 'Music', 'Everything']}

{'quote': "I played the piccolo in the 'Ides of March' and 'The Fantastic Mr. Fox' score.", 'author': 'Alexandre Desplat', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Fantastic', 'Score', 'Fox']}

{'quote': 'For me, comic scores always have to have some melancholy in the background.', 'author': 'Alexandre Desplat', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Me', 'Always', 'Comic']}
{'quote': 'Music is never inherently funny!', 'author': 'Alexandre Desplat', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Funny', 'Music', 'Never']}

{'quote': "In 'Secret Life of Pets,' it's a huge orchestra - really, really big.", 'author': 'Alexandre Desplat', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Life', 'Big', 'Secret']}

{'quote': 'The goal is to make the music really a part of the skin of the film, and not be detached.', 'author': 'Alexandre Desplat', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Music', 'Skin', 'Film']}
{'quote': "I've never been into monster movies, not my cup of tea.", 'author': 'Alexandre Desplat', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Movies', 'Tea', 'Never']}

{'quote': "Every film is a human encounter. It's people trying to collaborate and create something together.", 'author': 'Alexandre Desplat', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Together', 'People', 'Create']}

{'quote': '\n\n', 'author': 'Alexis de Tocqueville', 'country': 'French', 'profession': 'Historian', 'born': 'July 29', 'died': 'April 16', 'categories': ['Politics', 'Men', 'America']}

{'quote': 'We succeed in enterprises which demand the positive qualities we possess, but we excel in those which can also make use of our defects.', 'author': 'Alexis de Tocqueville', 'country': 'French', 'profession': 'Historian', 'born': 'July 29', 'died': 'April 16', 'categories': ['Positive', 'Business', 'Use']}

{'quote': 'There is hardly a political question in the United States which does not sooner or later turn into a judicial one.', 'author': 'Alexis de Tocqueville', 'country': 'French', 'profession': 'Historian', 'born': 'July 29', 'died': 'April 16', 'categories': ['Political', 'Turn', 'Judicial']}

{'quote': "Don't despair too much if you see beautiful things destroyed, if you see them perish. Because the best things are always growing in secret.", 'author': 'Ben Okri', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Best', 'Beautiful', 'See']}

{'quote': 'The strange thing about Africa is how past, present and future come together in a kind of rough jazz, if you like.', 'author': 'Ben Okri', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Future', 'Together', 'Past']}

{'quote': 'Politics is the art of the possible; creativity is the art of the impossible.', 'author': 'Ben Okri', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Politics', 'Art', 'Impossible']}

{'quote': 'When I write a poem, I go into a state of self-forgetfulness, and something higher takes over; I like to call it my best self.', 'author': 'Ben Okri', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Best', 'Self', 'Go']}

{'quote': 'One of the greatest gifts my father gave me - unintentionally - was witnessing the courage with which he bore adversity.', 'author': 'Ben Okri', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Courage', 'Adversity', 'Me']}

{'quote': 'I went to London because, for me, it was the home of literature. I went there because of Dickens and Shakespeare.', 'author': 'Ben Okri', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Home', 'Me', 'Literature']}

{'quote': 'You cannot come to a Nigerian restaurant without having pepper soup.', 'author': 'Ben Okri', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Restaurant', 'Soup', 'Cannot']}
{'quote': 'The greatest religions convert the world through stories.', 'author': 'Ben Okri', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['World', 'Through', 'Religions']}

{'quote': 'To sustain your belief through situations that completely undermine it is quite something.', 'author': 'Ben Okri', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Belief', 'Your', 'Through']}

{'quote': 'We have fallen into this very mean description of humanity. Naturalism in fiction is too reductive in its definition of human beings.', 'author': 'Ben Okri', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Humanity', 'Mean', 'Human']}
{'quote': 'To anyone who is homeless, I say, find a home.', 'author': 'Ben Okri', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Home', 'Find', 'Homeless']}
{'quote': 'I know that human beings are capable of anything.', 'author': 'Ben Okri', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Know', 'Capable', 'Anything']}

{'quote': "The best writing is not about the writer, the best writing is absolutely not about the writer, it's about us, it's about the reader.", 'author': 'Ben Okri', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Best', 'Us', 'Writing']}
{'quote': 'I was going to be a scientist.', 'author': 'Ben Okri', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Going', 'Scientist']}

{'quote': 'Home can be the friend you have been searching for all your life or the person you met once very briefly.', 'author': 'Ben Okri', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Life', 'Home', 'Person']}

{'quote': 'I became a sceptic of one way of seeing the world. And I think it is what started me in my awareness that any worldview is superstitious.', 'author': 'Ben Okri', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['World', 'Me', 'Awareness']}

{'quote': 'I am not fighting for success, just to get more beauty out of myself and share it with more people.', 'author': 'Ben Okri', 'country': '', 'profession': '', 'born': '', 'died': '', 'categories': ['Beauty', 'Success', 'Myself']}
